blueprint.description: Installs aria2, as well as AriaNg (a web interface for aria2), on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [aria2](https://aria2.github.io/) is a lightweight multi-protocol & multi-source command-line download utility. It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink. [AriaNg](http://ariang.mayswind.net/) is a modern web frontend that makes working with aria2 easier.
blueprint.name: Aria2/AriaNg
blueprint.title: Aria2/AriaNg
